definition: basin/flower pot/unit of volume equal to 12 斗[dou3] and 8 升[sheng1], approx 128 liters/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: According to the conodont and fusulinid fossils, their ages are determined to be Devonian -Permian.
sentences.chinese: 根據所含化石確定地層形成時代爲泥盆紀至二疊紀。

sentences.english: In Puan-Qianchang of Guizhou Province, the middle and late Devonian sedimentary rocks were mainly developed during the Devonian Period.
sentences.chinese: 貴州普安鉛廠泥盆紀主要發育中晚泥盆世的地層。

sentences.english: The Devonian strata are well developed in the Baishi Goujiaregionofcentral Longmen Mountains , Sichuan .
sentences.chinese: 龍門山中段白石苟家地區泥盆紀地層十分發育。

sentences.english: Gold-bearing beds belong to the Devonian System.
sentences.chinese: 含金層位爲泥盆紀地層。

sentences.english: The sedimentary basin of Devonian in Southern Guizhou, South China is euxinic.
sentences.chinese: 黔南泥盆紀沉積盆地是一個停滯缺氧盆地。

sentences.english: Geological events during the Devonian basin evolution were very closely related to mineralization.
sentences.chinese: 在泥盆紀盆地演化中，地質事件與成礦關係極爲密切。

sentences.english: Lower tracheophytes in existence since the devonian.
sentences.chinese: 自從泥盆紀以來就生存的低等維管植物。

sentences.english: The end of the Devonian was a crucial time for vertebrates.
sentences.chinese: 泥盆紀末期是脊椎動物出現很的關鍵時期。
